The Spin Doctor

The Spin Doctor - TSDr, LLC, is a custom tool manufacturer for wood-turning lathes. We feature the Clark Steady Rest, the patented Clark Deep Hollowing System, as well as the the Clark Sphere Turning Jig. Have peace of mind in The Dr's systems, we will work with you to make you happy and will not settle till your are 100% satisfied. All of our tooling systems are designed and manufactured to order by Dr. Keith and Alex Clark.
